name: Spacecats with Lasers : The Outerspace
description: In this twin-stick shooter the evil space rats locked you up in their space arena and your only hope is to fight as many waves as possible. Help your Spacecat to survive with the help of several perks and powerups.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium Dual-Core E5200 (2.5GHz) or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 740 / Radeon R7 250 or above DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space
